page.title: 07LIFE-STYLES
page.content: {The Donkey Stud-farm}is owned and run by Mrs.E.J.Pinnegar at her home on Gambles Lane Woodmancote. There is a 4.5 acre paddock, half of which is rented to other donkey owners. The farm began in 1967 when the family bought their first donkey as a pet. Now there are 8 donkeys including the stallion 'Teddy-bear' who is about to retire in favour of one of his sons. Mrs. Pinnegar and her family have taken their donkeys all over the country to appear in shows and driving competitions using the attractive hand-made cart with the gold-leaf finish.The rafters of one room in the house are lined with winners' rosettes and the cupboards are loaded with trophies and photographs. Mrs.Pinnegar's cart has been filmed for B.B.C. television.
